definitions.text: the subject matter of a conversation or discussion
examples: he didn't want to discuss that subject
it was a very sensitive topic
his letters were always on the theme of love

definitions.text: a unifying idea that is a recurrent element in literary or artistic work
examples: it was the usual `boy gets girl' theme

definitions.text: (music) melodic subject of a musical composition
examples: the theme is announced in the first measures
the accompanist picked up the idea and elaborated it

definitions.text: an essay (especially one written as an assignment)
examples: he got an A on his composition

definitions.text: (linguistics) the form of a word after all affixes are removed
examples: thematic vowels are part of the stem

definitions.text: provide with a particular theme or motive
examples: the restaurant often themes its menus
